alert.note: Alert for Brazoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 27 at 4:51AM CDT until further notice by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN BRAZORIA AND SOUTHEASTERN HARRIS COUNTIES... At 451 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over northeastern South Belt / Ellington, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Southwestern Pasadena, eastern Pearland, northern Friendswood, Deer Park, South Houston, South Belt / Ellington, Clear Lake, Greater Hobby Area, Golfcrest / Bellfort / Reveille, Edgebrook Area, Ellington Field, Hobby Airport and Meadowbrook / Allendale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
